title: What colors does the Samsung Galaxy S22 series come in?
content:
Samsung has refreshed its yearly lineup of flagship phones with the Galaxy S22 series in 2022. The standard Galaxy S22 is for those looking for a reliable flagship phone that doesn’t break the bank, while the top-of-the-line Galaxy S22 Ultra is for those who want the ultimate premium experience with absolutely no compromises. description: These are all the colors in which you will be able to buy the new Samsung Galaxy S22, Galaxy S22 Plus, and Galaxy S22 Ultra smartphones.
